Cass changes really werent great at all imo. Twin fangs delay seems rlly clunky... and her miasma is just so limited and find it so hard to utilise properly. and mana...ow. 

RIP Cass

Yeah her w is but useless now can't throw it over the wall whats up with that like all of a sudden she can't arc her poison any more :( an yeah twin fangs feels a lot slower now i don't mind the change were is doesn't go extra cool down on none poison target but over all pretty crappy make's me think i don't want too main her any more an that sucks, The no boots feels awkward nice having extra space no need to buy boots but anymore but ill have few more goes on that to see if its any good but shit all round and why did they think oh we will just change her an not ask any1 :(

i just think its funny how they were happy to release malzahar the way he was (which was OP af) but change cass into a functionally challenged champ. Restriction after restriction.... no wonder it feel awkward playing her. 

I hope the small tweaks they add in the minor patch alleviate this but i have doubts.
Quitting league over the Hextech Sweeper change good job riot

RIP QSS..."With the understanding that there may be outliers we need to address." Really riot? REALLY? Do you THINK? Christ. So you have just removed the single most viable item that allowed the adc to survive an ahead early game zed/fizz dive... and you want me to build an early pure tank Randouins or GA instead...thats not going to put me behind in terms of damage...oh what a wonderful 6 min passive cd I have to look forward to as well. Zed bans here i come.

Xerath ultimate seems broken. Does not immediately respond when r is pressed. Much less responsive than r prior to update. The unresponsiveness makes it REALLY hard to land them. Multiple r presses required to get it to fire sometimes which screws with timing. This isn't a "omg I don't like change" post,  I think there is actually something buggy happening.

Rito Plz fix mastery emotes pl0x {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Gotta say, not hugely fond of the changes to Illaoi test of spirit. When you successfully turn someone itno a vessell to start spawning tentacles, the only spawn 3, in very rapid succession. After the third one spawns, you lose the  vessell debuff, so the thrid tentacles wont attack you, making it seem very weak. Feels like she lost a lot of her bully potential.

Vlad is really strong right now, broken if you will. I feel like the problem with him is that his resource generation is too fast. With increase in damage from it on his abilities, I feel as if this is really too strong. For example, I was playing Azir (generally squishy champ) and took 300 damage from his Q-E combo at level 2. Not only is the damage produced from his abilities great, the heal is very strong as well.

I'm fairly sure a Vladimir with only Spectre's cowl, Ruby crystal and boots of swiftness shouldn't be able to 100-0 an Azir at any stage of the game.

Really? I found him to be really weak :(
Some of that was just getting to know the changes - finding out half-way through a turret dive that I can actually knock myself out of pool was a... painful discovery. 

The damage on his Q, W, and R are all down. The healing on his Q is down. The new E costs more health than the old one, and I'm not sure it does more damage than a four-stack E used to, plus doesn't give him the healing boost any more. With so much less healing and no spellvamp, all his baseline sustain (not including the heal from his ult) comes from his Crimson Rush, which gives him a very, very narrow window to act in. 

If you aren't in a position to take advantage of that 2 second window then you are actually in a significantly worse position, both damage and sustain-wise. It forces you to act when your cooldown wants you to act, and if you can't then you lose major damage and sustain.

Hmm... More RNG. This is good though! Eliminates stale games.

Soraka nerfs (AGAIN?!) on top of the Grievous Wounds change though? Like... At least revert her ult.

Only a nerf to her Q slow and the mastery thing which is understandable
She's broken AF right now with the new item changes (Athenes now adding to heals - 20% CDR, Spirit Visage healing increased to 25% and also had 10% CDR and now warmogs has 10% CDR. +5% CDR from the right mastery tree and windspeakers. That's 45% CDR and super powerful heals, tanky as hell and you fully regenerate your health pool when out of combat for like 8 seconds or whatever it is
She's the biggest pain in the butt atm
